org.raspberrypi.cecil.controller

Interface ControllerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller

    public interface ControllerInterface
    Controller interface methods. These methods are used by the view to notify the controller of user driven events.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Cathy Jin (cj8g10), Southampton University, United Kingdom

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compileClicked(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> code)
      Notify the controller that the compile button has been clicked.
      void fileOpened(java.io.File file)
      Notify the controller that a file has been opened.
      void ioCheckClicked(boolean ioPortsEnabled)
      Notify the controller that the use io checkbox has been clicked.
      void runClicked()
      Notify the controller that the run button has been clicked.
      void saveToFile(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> code, java.lang.String filename)
      Notify the controller that the save button has been clicked.
      void sendOutputToGPIO()
      Send each bit output to the physical GPIO ports of the Raspberry Pi.
      void stepThroughClicked(int line)
      Notify the controller that the step through button has been clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • sendOutputToGPIO

        void sendOutputToGPIO()
        Send each bit output to the physical GPIO ports of the Raspberry Pi.

      • compileClicked

        void compileClicked(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> code)
        Notify the controller that the compile button has been clicked.
        Parameters:
        code - An ArrayList of instruction lines. Each instruction is an ArrayList composed of three Strings.

      • runClicked

        void runClicked()
        Notify the controller that the run button has been clicked.

      • stepThroughClicked

        void stepThroughClicked(int line)
        Notify the controller that the step through button has been clicked.

      • fileOpened

        void fileOpened(java.io.File file)
        Notify the controller that a file has been opened.

      • saveToFile

        void saveToFile(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> code,
              java.lang.String filename)
        Notify the controller that the save button has been clicked.
        Parameters:
        code - An ArrayList of instruction lines. Each instruction is an ArrayList composed of three Strings.

      • ioCheckClicked

        void ioCheckClicked(boolean ioPortsEnabled)
        Notify the controller that the use io checkbox has been clicked.
        Parameters:
        ioPortsEnabled - State of the checkbox.
